title: If display property set to 'none', item not hidden in new pdf emitter
OB: When setting the display property of an item to 'none' in the new pdf emitter, the item's visibility does not change.
EB: The label should disappear from the preview in the PDF.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the PDF emitter and load the document.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Preview the document in PDF format and observe that the label is still visible, despite the display property being set to 'none'.
